The patient is currently hemodynamically stable post-pericardiocentesis, with Swan-Ganz and arterial line catheters in place. She is receiving IV fluids and has been started on antibiotics for suspected pneumonia. Her right pleural effusion is likely due to fluid overload or malignancy.
